scripts.dev: (cd apps/benchmark && npx webpack-dev-server --open --mode development) & (cd apps/keyboard && npx webpack-dev-server --mode development)
scripts.install-all: npm install && (cd apps/benchmark && npm install) && (cd apps/keyboard && npm install)
scripts.uninstall-all: rm -rf node_modules && (cd apps/benchmark && rm -rf node_modules) && (cd apps/keyboard && rm -rf node_modules)
